text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Forshaga Municipality | native_name = Forshaga kommun | native_name_lang = sv | settlement_type = Municipality | image_skyline = Forshaga Slott vinter.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Slottet villa (1880s) | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Forshaga vapen.svg | shield_size = 120x80px | image_map = Forshaga Municipality in Värmland County.png | map_alt = | map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Sweden | subdivision_type1 = County | subdivision_name1 = Värmland County | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = Seat | seat = Forshaga | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = Area as of . | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_note = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = Province | blank_info_sec1 = Värmland | blank1_name_sec1 = Municipal code | blank1_info_sec1 = 1763 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = SE | website = www.forshaga.se | footnotes = }} Forshaga Municipality (Forshaga kommun) is a municipality in Värmland County in west central Sweden. Its seat is located in the town of Forshaga. The first municipality named Forshaga was a market town (köping) which was detached from Grava in 1944. The local government reform of the 1970s made Forshaga a unitary municipality in 1971 and in 1974 Ullerud was added to it. Forshaga was known in the 14th century as a location for salmon fishing in the river Klarälven. Salmon was used both locally and transported to monasteries in southern Sweden. Forshaga is still known for its rich fishing waters, which attract hobby sport fishers from all over the country. ==Localities== *Forshaga (seat) *Deje ==References== ==External links== * *Forshaga Municipality - Official site Category:Municipalities of Värmland County
title: Forshaga Municipality
